nodes.bodyText: This class seems to really be a testing utility class. I'm not sure this is the best package for it. I would at least expect some documentation on this class.

Which package would you put it in?
EDIT: Rephrasing, this utility is very specific to the test here (at least for now) - where would you expect it to be otherwise?
Oh sorry, it is already in the test sources folder. My mistake, the package is fine. I would appreciate some use case or behaviour description as the javadoc on this class though
